title: Divorce By Agreement - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Demons   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Immortals   Time Travel
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
At the start of a relationship, praises crafted from beautiful words are common.
At the end of a relationship, there are only words dripping with cynicism. Even facing each other with swords is a common occurrence.

To summarize it, this immortal couple, who were married for 500 years, got a divorce because… she wanted to eat spicy food!         

>
